pages.title: Bauxite
pages.text: Bauxite is the primary source of aluminum.

pages.title: Cassiterite Ore
pages.text: Cassiterite is the primary source of tin.

pages.title: Galena Ore
pages.text: A dense lead-bearing ore found deep underground.

pages.title: Cinnabar Ore
pages.text: Glowing red ore used for mercury.
